Package model

Class NotePlayer

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
model.NotePlayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class NotePlayer
extends java.lang.Thread
Class tasked with triggering a note or playing a whole song, should be started to play the song

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread

    java.lang.Thread.State, java.lang.Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler

  • Constructor Details

    • NotePlayer

      public NotePlayer​(Song song, float volume, SongEnder songEnder, SongValidator songValidator)
      Creates a NotePlayer with the given attributes and initializes the necessary tools to play a song when started
      Parameters:
      song - Song to play when started
      volume - Volume to play the song in (1 = volume of the note, 0 = silent)
      songEnder - Object to notify when the song ends
      songValidator - Object to validate a note play to

      volume - Volume to play the song in (1 = volume of the note, 0 = silent)
      songEnder - Object to notify when the song ends
